author: wsjcom
title: Second Amendment Penumbras and Musings
text:
Your editorial “John Paul Stevens for the NRA” (March 28) asserts that the former Supreme Court justice’s call to repeal the Second Amendment would “repeal the right to bear arms.”
It wouldn’t, any more than repealing the First Amendment would eliminate the right to speak or publish freely, because the amendments didn’t create the rights. James Madison and other architects of the Constitution were firmly attached to the doctrine of inherent, natural, human rights that existed prior to and outside of governments. Accordingly,...
